document_data.name: Popper
document_data.mainbody:
'''Popper''' was a nihilistic [[kobold]] merchant member of the [[Circus of the Last Days]] troupe in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I die. You die. We all die. Big woof! Have a treato - it'll make it better.''|Popper the Kobold}}
document_data.Description: Popper was a short red-scaled kobold with a cheerful attitude and a snazzy hat.
document_data.Possessions: The kobold ran a stall at the Circus of the Last Days where he sold various "edible" treats, some [[potion]]s, like ''[[elixirs of guileful movement]]'', ''[[potions of flying]]'', ''[[elixirs of necrotic resistance]]'', as well as ''[[smokepowder arrow]]s'' and a single pair of ''[[dark displacement gloves]]''.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Popper accompanied the Circus of the Last Days to [[Toril]] and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]]. There, the kobold was known to steal various items and "treats" off of corpses, including a severed hand from the corpse of [[Dribbles]] the clown, on which he promptly gnawed.
